comment: I appreciate her timely communication and organization skills. She spent quite some time with me during test reviews in complex and she explained concepts in a simpler way that I can understand. She know her stuff and most of her advise in test taking strategies is very practical.
She provided thorough feedback to improve the work and replied to emails quickly.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She's approachable and caring, helping groups in the project all the way.

the group project is basically your entire grade in this class besides the tests. if you get a sucky group be prepared to try to save your grade lol. class was 3 hours long and she would lecture the entire class. attendance is mandatory.
